name: Dawn (itch) (DreamCartographer)
description:
On his way to see his very first sunrise, a sentient blob of darkness comes across a mysterious old tower. What will he find there?

Click on the images and buttons to explore and advance the story!

A short, mostly textless IF piece made in Twine for WJG Narrative Game Jam #2. It has two endings.

Theme: "Ten Minutes"

Restriction: "One Scene"

Credits

Story, art and programming by me

Arrow buttons by fsy

Background photos:

Sheng Li on Unsplash

Peter H from Pixabay

stux from Pixabay

Backgrounds edited in Pixlr and Pixelator

Music:

"Ludum Dare 32 - Track 2", "Ludum Dare 30 - Track 5", "VGMA Challenge - July 18th", "VGMA Challenge - July 30th" - Abstraction
